subject: Zenith Bank Plc
body:
Zenith Bank Plc
Plot 84 Ajose Adeogun Street
Victoria Island, Lagos
From the Desk of
Mr. John C,. Obi
ATM Product/ Foreign Operations
,( ZENITH BANK PLC)
ATTN: Sirs
We the management  Zenith Bank is contacting you today based on the
instruction we received from International Monetary Fund  (IMF) and
Central Bank of Nigeria(CBN)  for processing of your Automated Teller
Machine( ATM card ) in your name with your inheritance fund of
$10.7Million and ship to you with the PIN NUMBER for you to start
making withdrawal of your fund  with your card in any ATM Machine of
your choice in your country or anywhere in the world.
I was instructed to handle this compensation payment a month now
because of the injustices and cheating melted out to you by past
corrupt official so I need not to burden you again .
I want to assure you that I will resolve this your fund delay once and
for all if you will work with me and give me the opportunity because
without your cooperation this ATM card will not be release to you as
this will cost you just a token to receive your ATM card and the fee
is for the shipment of your ATM card to you and Don,t be discourage
with the  fee is for the progress of your transaction.
I want you to know that I will not disappoint you if you will believe
and work with me so that your ATM card be ship to you by week  and
will be a thing of the past.
I hope you will be okay with this I advise you to reconfirm your
details again to enable us process and dispatch your ATM card already
issued in your name by this week. the attached scan copy of your ATM
card will send to upon your confirmation to receive the ATM card while
the original copy and the PIN will be send to you through government
courier service.
Thanks for your anticipated cooperation as we are ready to serve you better.
Awaiting Your urgent response.
Yours Faithfully
Mr. John C, Obi
Executive Director.
ATM Product/ Foreign Operations
ZENITH BANK PLC

subject: Re: Zenith Bank Plc
body:
Hello Mr. John C, Obi,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite an unexpected message. I'm not sure how the Monetary Fund IMF and Central Bank of Nigeria got my information, but it's interesting to know that there's an ATM card in my name.

Could you please explain more about this? How did this come about? And why was I chosen for this?

Also, you mentioned a fee for the shipment of the ATM card. Could you provide more details on that? How much is it exactly?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
John
